lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I can help people across the world make their lives a little better. This makes the world a little better. I now live in a better world. Any questions?
lender.occupational_info: I buy musical supplies from a distributor and sell them on eBay.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great organization which connects people of all races and backgrounds in a common cause to make lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a senior in high school.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: it helps and I admire hard workers.
lender.occupational_info: I do interior design for resort hotels.

lender.name: Michon
lender.loan_because: I want to help people realize their dreams! I love the entrepreneur spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I help people act on their promptings to build relationships both personally and in business.

lender.name: Walt
lender.loan_because: I love the thought of helping out somebody who is working hard to help themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in buying or selling their homes.

lender.name: Jay and David
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of making an investment in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Jay works a 9-5 job in Information Technology. David is a teacher.

lender.name: Jose
lender.whereabouts: San Pedro Garza Garcia Nuevo Leon

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I review government policy.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I just really want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: My day job is working in customer service, assisting people with questions they have about the company I work for. But what I really enjoy is writing stories and novels and sharing them.

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because: It's a small world.
lender.occupational_info: I study at a university in Montreal, Canada. My specialty is animation and creative writing such as poetry and short stories.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: from studying the "trade vs. aid" issue while teaching students debate, realized that direct loans are an empowering way to help create opportunities for economic growth in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I make music videos, commercials, and short films, and recently graduated from film school. To pay the bills, I teach English, Math, and Debate at an after school learning center for children 8-18.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it´s great to support some people in their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: mother of three girls

lender.name: Maribel
lender.occupational_info: Si se puede!

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: it is a duty and a privilege in life to help others.I have been helped in times of need and know how it can instantly change your course in life.

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: people have helped me in the past. It's my turn. Someday, hopefully the people that may be helped by my loans can help someone else. Nobody gets by alone in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach vocal music to children ages 11 to 15.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: It's a great way inspire entrepreneurs who otherwise might not be able to achieve their dreams. It's a neighborly helping hand, sometimes reaching out from around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work on software for people to do their banking on the Internet.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I know microfunding makes a big diffrence. I worked as a development helper for sometime and know how small credits can start something wunderfull
lender.occupational_info: I work as a programmer for a pharmaceutival company.

lender.name: Jukka
lender.loan_because: ....we are all the same.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lender.name: Jean-Mathias
lender.loan_because: ...I think some of my savings should profit directly to people with courage- and not just to the banking biz.

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I run a charity that helps musicians to develop their careers.

lender.name: irish
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I'm a middle class American that is extremely wealthy by comparison to the average person in most other countries. For that reason, I feel that I should "pay it forward"
lender.occupational_info: I develop web-enabled software.

lender.name: Sam & Alison
lender.loan_because: we think it's a nice thing to do :)

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: As a Christ-follower, I have been called to serve others.

lender.name: Amiranto
lender.loan_because: We have Purchase Order but we don't have more money to invest to this project
lender.occupational_info: I am a mobile content application developer . I make a mobile phone application for Nokia, Sony Ericsson, Motorola and I made it by order from our client

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I think it is a terrific way to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I try to move products as efficiently as possible to distribution points while maintaining a high level of custormer service.

lender.name: Teri & Imad
lender.loan_because: What you give to help others is forever a gift to your own spirit.
lender.occupational_info: We are engineers helping to build and operate mobile phone networks.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I want to help and support people and I want to invest money in the right things.
lender.occupational_info: I m working in the sales department of an american toy and game company in Germany and take care of some of the important customers of the German branch (like department stores, hypermarkets and specialised toy shops)

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.
lender.occupational_info: I work with information technology

lender.name: Jimena
lender.loan_because: I like having the opportunity to help other people. Besides Kiva gives me the chance to show my little sister Alejandra that there is an active way to help our community

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Knowing the difficulty in obtaining bank loans, never mind attracting investors, I know how difficult it is to start, maintain and expand a business in U.S., never mind in third world nations. Helping others with raising funds is more rewarding as it allows me to help more people as a group then individually.
lender.occupational_info:
I help small start up businesses with FundRaiser 1.0 which enables everyone to raise the funds they need for their needs without the worry or concern to repay loans or interest expenses.
This is the perfect system for anyone in the world who wants to raise funds for their business, non profit charity or for personal needs. With cost of setting up Fundraiser 1.0 Software only $4.99 U.S., it is within reach of everyone who needs funding. www.Cash-Fundraiser.com

lender.name: david
lender.occupation: former government worker, not have own small busin

lender.name: Simona
lender.loan_because: I find it a congenial way to help people construct a better future for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can...and I hope to make the world a smaller place...I want to support girls and women of the world
lender.occupational_info: Office work - answer phones, book appointments, bank, invoice.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: we want to give back...again and again...for all of the blessings of our lives in family and friends. We want to connect with people in other lands knowing that we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: We are both retired but doing volunteer work near to where we live

lender.name: jenni
lender.loan_because:
i haven't always been fortunate enough to have the resources to share with others. i think it's important to do so when you can.
i'd like to own my own business someday, but for now i'll help others start theirs!
lender.occupational_info: i write websites for community education programs.

lender.name: Parth
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org empowers those in poverty with a financial opportunity that often transforms entrepreneur's lives and usually transcends into a positive social impact.
lender.occupational_info: Co-Founder and National Director of Kiva High School, a national network of high school students, and their respective chapters, unified by a belief that poverty can be alleviated and that microfinance is an effective tool to achieve this end.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Everyone could use a little help sometimes.

lender.name: ILONA
lender.loan_because: Rich is who owns a lot, richer who does not need much and richest who gives a lot!

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: For us it's just a little amount of money but it can change so much the world of other people.
lender.occupational_info: I am working as secretary at the local university.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I like to share.

lender.name: Dave & Colleen
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance in life.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: To give to the KIVA community makes my heart happy.
lender.occupational_info: My company and team provides virtual support to executives, professionals, and corporations with administrative, business development, and writing assistance. An alternative method of providing services with cost-effective solutions. In addition, we don't clog up highways and create more pollution or waste precious fuel, and we are able to spend more time with our families instead of spending it in traffic.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: we are all connected. Helping others helps all of us to live in a better world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with adults who have lost their ability to speak.

lender.name: Quinn
lender.loan_because: no matter how much life splits from the source, everything tends to gravitate back towards it.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I feel that an individuals small business is more to them than just a machine to derive income. The roots of individuals and families who own small businesses around the world is a reflection of decades of history, culture, and craftsmanship that will go into his or hers future project. I support anyone who dreams about owning his or her own business, because everyone deserves to be in the drivers seat.
lender.occupational_info: I am the creative director and also a partner in Image Creative Organization, an advertising and organizational identity firm in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Our group develops a wide variety of marketing communication material from concept to creation.

lender.name: Bernardine
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: it's a small world and we are all responsible for each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a theatre in Switzerland, and although I am bound to my (german) language, I work with a lot of people from all over the world.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: there is always someone with a dream that has less than I do...I just want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help to educate others about daily rituals that will them to obtain improved well being and beauty in an eco-conscious manner. I provide a place for people to receive spa calming treatments.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I think that people who are willing to work hard deserve the chance to succeed in life. Plus, I've always wanted to be an international financier.
lender.occupational_info: I am a government attorney. A big part of my job is helping business owners with their tax questions.

lender.name: Bernadette
lender.loan_because: I want to help people change their lives for the better.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: i am 14 years old and I live in poor city what called tbilisi,my dream is to became a famous bascetball star,I am vhery tall and have vhery good skills,but whe have vhery big family i have 3 sisters,and whe dont have money for my trainings,to became a star you need to train every day,if you help me with this problem i be vhery happy,and i can train my skills,please help how you can. Sorry for mistakes with love david.
lender.occupational_info: i am 14 years old and I live in poor city what called tbilisi,my dream is to became a famous bascetball star,I am vhery tall and have vhery good skills,but whe have vhery big family i have 3 sisters,and whe dont have money for my trainings,to became a star you need to train every day,if you help me with this problem i be vhery happy,and i can train my skills,please help how you can. Sorry for mistakes with love david.

lender.name: Andriy
lender.loan_because: I want to make Ukrainians' orphans' life better at their own home.
lender.occupational_info: Orphans' Future Foundation Provides special care for Ukrainian 290 orphans ages 3-21 in small Ternopil region.

lender.name: GFWC-Gun Lake Book Club
lender.loan_because: Our book club read BANKER TO THE POOR by Muhammad Yunus. We were inspired to put a microloan together in response.
lender.occupational_info: Our book club members are housewives, former teachers, a minister's wife, mothers, etc. We all volunteer in some capacity.

lender.name: Gautam
lender.loan_because: I grew up in India and know from first hand experience how much difference one Dollar can make in a developing country. I think the concept of micro financing is brilliant. Its amazing how the money I spend to buy a week's groceries can help someone in a developing country start a business.
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day trying to build meaningful reports from data collected over many years. These reports are meant to help the management of an organization in tracking status of activities, support its decision making process.

lender.name: erica
lender.loan_because: I want to be helpful.
lender.occupational_info: I sell chemicals made of natural items like citrus oil and soy which are safe for the user and the environment

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people; both as individuals and as communities.
lender.occupational_info: We work with the private sector, non-profits, governmental agencies, and indian tribes to improve efficiency, the environment, and their bottom line.

lender.name: connie
lender.loan_because: I have travelled a lot and have seen many people who just needed a little help, just as I have at times. It's great when you have people around who care enough to do small things that make a huge difference.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I 'm very fortunate and would like to give a little back

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others achieve their dreams. It makes me happy to see others happy!
lender.occupational_info: I work with a variety of different people. I enjoy my work and love helping others.

lender.name: Sam and Lindsey
lender.loan_because: We want to help out in the places we travel.
lender.occupational_info: Sitting in a cubicle staring at a computer.

lender.name: Maxime
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe that we can pull the world out of poverty and make a difference where it is needed. I am also loaning to help people help themselves and other members of their communities.

lender.name: Rasheed
lender.loan_because: I would like to make another business, rais my income, survive for competitive life, help my neighbour fund, open the work field in my village
lender.occupational_info: I have already had 7 sewing machines, and 7 employee. We sewed many DOLLS and PILLOWS, a few kind or a few types of dolls, like small Bear, Donald, Micky, etc. They made from soft-leather and textile. I sells them to the shops or direct to customers. they used for gift, accessories, or just a toy.

lender.name: Meryl & Jeff
lender.loan_because: we like to help others. We all have been in need of something at some time in our lives. Reaching out to others creates community.
lender.occupational_info: One of us has returned to school to study architecture after a long career in engineering, the other of us is managing a non-profit business.

lender.name: Christoph
lender.loan_because: It is fun and might help people.

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have a chance to follow their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Student with a background in science and visual arts.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I can only afford to loan a little and I love that it can do such big things for other business owners!
lender.occupational_info: I write website content and advertising.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: a hand up is better than a hand out
lender.occupational_info: I (hopefully) make web things work better for people and believe in open, accessible technology.

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I answer emails and chats and phone calls for people who require assistance on our website

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It seems to work, I'm impressed by Kiva and the folks behind it, and it's fun for me.

lender.name: Slim
lender.occupational_info: I am a shaman, healer and writer

lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part in helping others out.

lender.name: William
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in 11th grade.

lender.name: Etta
lender.loan_because: my daughter Hannah gave me a gift certificate for my 60th birthday. I am very proud of her!

lender.name: Kate and Jon
lender.occupational_info: Cultivating food for healthy people and healthy land, Creating sculptural and functional pottery pieces to inspire and because its what I do.

lender.name: SpillingBuckets.com
lender.loan_because: We want to share opportunity.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: My son introduced me to Kiva and he asked that I donate as a birthday gift for him. What a wonderful gift!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a teacher/librarian in a school of 400 students. I work with students aged 4 to 13 years.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I loan because I love :)

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: JCvS
lender.loan_because: we want to share.
lender.occupational_info: Busy helping five young adults reach their potential.

lender.name: Imelda
lender.loan_because: I am a 42 year old woman from the Philippines.I had a work before but due to the increasing rate of unemployment and job loss, I became one of them and and now I want to make a loan of $5000 because I want to put up a small restaurant since cooking has been and is still my passion and because I wanted to be out of the poverty group. I want to be one of those who still has the capability of making this world go round and help in making others know that they are still useful and not a burden to those around them. In other words, I want to ask for help so I can also give help to those who are also in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a call center agent before but because of clients who are affected by the crisis that we are having right now some accounts were pulled out and mine was included, hence my removal from the company. And also, I am now experiencing pain in my knees and I have uncontrollable hypertension, I cannot perform well at work coz it usually is at night time.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: While microloans don't replace the need for aid, I believe they can have a big impact. As the entrepreneurs increase their business, they'll create jobs both by their own hiring and the increased purchases they make from others.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for a variety of embedded systems such as telephone equipment, automobiles, and aircraft.

lender.name: Jay & Patti
lender.loan_because: This a direct way to make a difference in people's lives that help them while permitting them to get assistance in a business like way so that they are not accepting charity. They are on an equal footing with their lenders so this is a business relationship with ongoing business partners.
lender.occupational_info: I assist employers in the design and administration of programs that they provide to their employees that cover them for medical costs and retirement planning.

lender.name: Shray
lender.loan_because: its my small way of hopefully making a tangible, long lasting difference in peoples lives via a "system" that respects and empowers them.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being a part of helping others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Many people don't get second chances, a new hope, or of the things we take for granted. My work is to help those that wouldn't otherwise get this hope and make it a reality.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I used to read books and come up with inane theories about how the world works. Now I want to be a doctor.

lender.name: Murray
lender.loan_because: “If you wish to experience peace, provide peace for another.” -Dalai Lama, 1935
lender.occupational_info: study, hang out, enjoy life

lender.name: yolie
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Dustin
lender.loan_because: I am hoping to help out a bit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student.

lender.name: Amridzah
lender.loan_because: “Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Buy him a fishing rod and you feed him for a lifetime.” Heh.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites better.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Jesus said that how I respond to those in need is how I've responded to him.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I think this is an excellent idea!

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: We are all one, connected by strings the eyes can't see.
lender.occupational_info: I study the way white blood cells respond to bacteria, viruses and cancer with the hopes to design vaccines or treatments which are better and cheaper, and therefore more widely available.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I know that every little bit helps. I hope to assist some of the disadvantaged - but seemingly motivated - individuals that I find through my Kiva travels. If each of these I help can improve their lives and climb out of poverty through my small contribution, I can help make our world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help make the world smaller by working on websites of all sizes, mostly on financial transactions.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Everyone who has the dream of creating a better life and the motivation to bring that dream to fruition deserves access to the initial resources they need to make it happen. We've been blessed tremendously in our own business, which also had its humble beginnings, albeit within the context of a much more stable economy.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an online publisher. I create topical websites that assist others in solving various problems.

lender.name: Rangga
lender.loan_because: From my family background, i came from a simple family, my dad is an employee with minimum wage, and my mother isn't working or have no career. So, very difficult for me to start my own business without any capitals. Therefore, i know how enterpreneurs out there who struggle for some amount of money to gain their capital needs!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Full time Designer, i have obsession about design industry, graduated from Visual Communication & Arts Faculty (PCU - Surabaya, Indonesia) in the year 2002, now decided to be a full time designer and enterpereneur.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: why wouldnt you?
lender.occupational_info: I work for a multinational software company

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: Somethimes its so easy helping people.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I prefer to help those who will help themselves, to the benefit of their community
lender.occupational_info: I am kept well occupied in my retirement serving my Church, also Churches Together, and the CPRE which concerns itself with the wellbeing of rural communities. 4 children 9 grandchildren are a happy diversion

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I have a little bit to spare and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I imagine.

lender.name: Roar
lender.loan_because: i can sometimes afford to. Would like to help.

lender.name: Lydia Ann
lender.loan_because: I admire anyone and everyone that has a passionate dream and is willing to do whatever it takes to make thier dream come to fruition. I hope that the funds I donate give people the beautiful gift of getting to see thier dreams unfold into reality.

lender.name: Tarek
lender.loan_because: I want to see if it really works!and if it`s works it`s a good thing!
lender.occupational_info: I`m learning!!!

lender.name: Arline
lender.loan_because: The Bible tells us that we are to love others. I think it's important to help those who have a need and a drive. God bless you all for your strength, courage, and vision.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit. My goal is to help as many as I can, as often as I can, and with grace.

lender.name: Sibylle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be successful.

lender.name: Vern and Jane
lender.loan_because: I think assisting people who are trying to improve their lives is a worthwhile venture.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: My wife and I want to make a positive difference.
lender.occupational_info:
We have been together for almost 15 years and we have two beautiful children that mean everything to us.
Nicole is a physical therapist and I sing for senior citizens. I also have a small real estate company that owns nine rental apartments.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I feel that direct empowerment is the best way to help our fellow humans.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to be better leaders.

lender.name: Sverre
lender.loan_because: Costing so little - helping so much. While we barely notice the money we lend is gone, it makes a significant difference to the borrower.
lender.occupational_info: Currently studying economics and management.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: We who are fortunate should help those who are striving to better themselves and the world around them.

lender.name: Nyani-lisha
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make the world better.
lender.occupational_info: A secretary, no coffee

lender.name: Lee Anne
lender.loan_because: This is a way to connect with people and hopefully give others the opportunities that are easily available to many people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school students in Goshen, Ky. Most of the kids I teach are 16-17 year olds. I teach reading and writing and I love my job!

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance to better their lives

lender.name: Laura Dove
lender.loan_because: If I can, I should. A tiny fraction of my own income can make a huge difference in someone else's life. I wish everyone would do this!

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe sustainable, economic well-being is critical to the future of our world. I also lend because I believe I can make a difference through KIVA. It seems I can make a difference in a micro-economy whereas my numbers are lost in the macro-economy.
lender.occupational_info: I help the universities in the US operate more efficiently and effectively by using computer systems. By more efficiently, I mean at lower cost. By more effectively, I mean doing a better job of educating our students.

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: their must be hope for anybody
lender.occupational_info: I'm a networker for museums

lender.name: Rasyidah
lender.loan_because: I owe it to the rest of the world to help them!
lender.occupational_info: I study most of the time and find it hard to give back to the community. I'm so glad i can contribute in a tiny way to someone so far away...

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given the chance to succeed.

lender.name: christer
lender.loan_because: I believe this will actually help people.
lender.occupational_info: I study to become a teacher

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: I admire the pluck and scrap of each entrepeneur.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to advance their careers.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good and I hope I am changing someone's life for the better. It may be a small loan but I hope it makes a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently working on my doctorate program to help people teach young children who have Asperger's Syndrome (early intervention). I am also a mother to three boys and stay home with them (when not in school).

lender.name: Paul M
lender.loan_because: I can, and if I can (and feel it is the right thing to do), I should. So I do.

lender.name: Mohan
lender.loan_because: God is the God of the Poor, the Disabled, the Oppressed and the Outcastes of Society. That is why Jesus descended in Humility from Heaven to Earth, death on the Cross and the depths of Hell to rise Triumphant to the Highest Heavens again.
lender.occupational_info: Christians know no barriers between nations, communities and individuals in the building of God's kingdom of Love. May all the citizens of the rich world (North and South) lend freely to keep money moving to do good constantly. God bless you all.

lender.name: Debi
lender.loan_because: A hand up is the best I can give, it's like teaching a man to fish.
lender.occupational_info: I help in my husband's construction business.

lender.name: Prima
lender.loan_because: It promotes Peace.

lender.name: Margarita
lender.loan_because: Its the best way to give people a chance!

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: there's to much injustice in the world

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I like helping people, and I feel like I've been blessed with the resources to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: I study the weather in hopes of being able to better predict how its impacts on the world will change in the future.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I'd like to contribute a little in helping out this world.

lender.name: Deneene
lender.loan_because: I think people deserve a chance for sucsees . With this global technology we are getting to help those we never could help before
lender.occupational_info: I am the middle woman between wholesale and retial in the auto industry. I write book about grief and spirituality

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Others also need a chance.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Micro finance can end poverty unlike anything else yet created.
lender.occupational_info: I work along side doctors and nurses to help people who are sick and injured.

lender.name: Kaye
lender.loan_because: I have visited Central America, and I have enjoyed the beauty of their countries and the hospitality of their people. I love it there, and I hope to move there someday. So in a way, I am investing in my future, too.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: If we want to make a difference in the world, we have to start somewhere. Why not here and now? "Be the change you want to see in the world." ~Mahatma Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I work to build a better community and preserve our natural world for future generations.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: I love to empower human potential

lender.name: Elissa
lender.loan_because: Even the smallest bit of help can make a big difference.

lender.name: LjB
lender.loan_because: It is such a sweet privilege to be able to touch folks around the world in small ways that aggregate to make such a huge difference!

lender.name: Petra
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Tzveta
lender.loan_because: What comes around goes around.

lender.name: Anders Ulrik
lender.loan_because: I want to enable other people to make a difference in their own life.

lender.name: Steve & Ky
lender.loan_because: We are able to... people helping people is what the world is all about, isn't it?

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I can. What little I have is a fortune to many others. If I can just help one person at a time to better his or her life, it is worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a jack of all trades. I teach math and social studies to middle schoolers. I am a mother , a cook, a builder, a gardener, etc.

lender.name: The Girlfriends
lender.loan_because: We believe in helping others to help themselves.

lender.name: Jills Grandchildren
lender.loan_because: Our Grandmother Jill Kidder would have wanted us too.
lender.occupational_info: We are the grandchildren of Jill Kidder, who died in June 2008 at the age of 84. She showed us that our work will always be to help where we can.

lender.name: Nata
lender.loan_because: we live in a global community.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Cameron
lender.loan_because: micro-finance is one of the most efficient means of poverty reduction.

lender.name: Ana
lender.loan_because: when the whole transaction is completed there is an affirmation to my belief in the human spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom, and now I help my daughters raise their daughters. The best job in the world.

lender.name: Brianne
lender.loan_because: I think it helps people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children how to sing and play music.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed and fortunate in my life, whether the result of hard work or sheer luck or a combination of both. To offer someone the opportunity to make their life or circumstances better is a rare gift indeed. You know what they say about teaching a man to fish ...

lender.name: ZephyrWoods
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: Kiva seems like a wonderful way to help people make their lives better.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: I feel that those of us fortunate to be born into countries like the USA have an opportunity to be of service and to help our neighbors on this planet.
lender.occupational_info: I work behind the scenes in Television Production.

lender.name: PremiumTalk
lender.loan_because: We like this concept
lender.occupational_info: Develop software that allows small businesses to safely sell services via phone, chat or video.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I can and because I believe that micocredit is a very powerful tool to help development.

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: because I can and it helps others to improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure our company has a good computer system that can help get the material and services needed to keep the steel making business we all work for profitable.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, The faces of the women I lend to inspire and give perspective on my life: my challenges are nothing compared to the struggles of these courageous people to survive and thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I work hard to insure that people live bigger lives.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help along life's way, this is my chance to make a small difference in the life of a person whom I've never formally met.
lender.occupational_info: I help set up medications for people in assisted living homes in Arizona. I make sure they are not given medications that interact with each other, are spaced out properly throughout the day, and don't cause harm with any other illness/disease the person may have.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: God has been good to me !!! I believe If you are willing to work you should get the chance

lender.name: Bette
lender.loan_because: I am incredibly fortunate to have more than I need - and seem to forget that fact, frequently. Being connected to this organization helps me to maintain a global perspective and be a global citizen. (Also, my friends Molly, Kregg, and Quinn told me to...Thanks, guys!)
lender.occupational_info: I work at a college

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: My godparents thought it was important for me to spread God's love by helping those in need.
lender.occupational_info: Cry, Eat, Sleep, Cry, Eat, Sleep...........

lender.name: Bob & Sue
lender.loan_because: Our grandchildren started and told us we should loan as well. Out of the mouths of babes....

lender.name: Dara
lender.loan_because: I should

lender.name: mary
lender.loan_because: I have also been an entrepreneur
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician and a music teacher

lender.name: April
lender.loan_because: My Mother always told me "If you work hard, stay passionate about what you do and keep a humble soul...the sky is the limit". These folks have passion, hope and deserve a chance to fly.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in aviation retail for the last 12 years, we supply flight crews the products needed for the job. crewoutfitters.com!

lender.name: Forhim Technologies
lender.loan_because: We're committed as a company to helping others succeed as we grow.
lender.occupational_info: We are diligently committed to developing affordable and award winning POS solutions extensively covering various business needs.

lender.name: Amyr
lender.loan_because: I want to help change lives.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I read books about medicine and look at old things from the past and write about what I read and see.

lender.name: Gordon
lender.occupational_info: Retired professor of electrical engineering at a university.

lender.name: Bekah
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to have more than I need and want to help others who don't have enough.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a nurse who takes care of kids who have cancer.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I see the people of the world as a family. I want my family in developing countries to succeed and know that I believe in them. When we are connected, love wins and war ceases.
lender.occupational_info: I cause children to speak clearly and be heard. I cause unity and fun between adults and children. I work with children struggling to develop language and parents struggling to understand their child.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I've at one point lost everything, and built a company out of a public library, taking client calls out of the mens toilet.. It's grown into a full fledged company in multiple countries... it's time to let someone else give it a try.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to help people across the globe who decide how best to make their own life better without charities deciding what is best for them.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the courage it takes to do what you want to do with your life!
lender.occupational_info: I choose and create the music and sound effects for live theatre.

lender.name: Gitte
lender.loan_because: I'd like to make a difference.

lender.name: The Burrows Family
lender.loan_because: We can afford to help others and believe that hard working people trying to improve their situation deserve a helping hand.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: Just 4 fun.
lender.occupational_info: coder

lender.name: Arnaud
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of advicing large corporations on their strategy

lender.name: Suse
lender.loan_because: action speaks louder than words

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: It's a small step for me and a huge step for those I'm loaning to. It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people understand issues and solve problems, either through business development or public relations consulting.

lender.name: kathrin
lender.loan_because: it helps

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: For the cost of a dinner out I can help an entrepreneur grow their business and improve their quality of life. That's a good deal.
lender.occupational_info: Help businesses succeed using the internet.

lender.name: Germán Bencci
lender.loan_because: We have the opportunity and the responsibility to support anybody willing to improve their lives. I loan because Kiva takes the advantage of the Internet as a tool to reach the masses and mixing microloans with crowdfunding in a transparent environment, enabling the most diverse network unthinkable a decade ago. But above all, giving feels amazing!
lender.occupational_info: I work in the innovations and telecoms sector. I work together with companies to bring technologies together, protect and share their ideas. I am also involved in the performing arts and support charity water projects worldwide.

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: I have a blessed life and I have a heart for those that are trying to improve their quality of living with few resources.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make their travel dreams come true daily. It's not a job of life and death, but my job makes people happy, so I'm happy.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I want my daughter and son to grow up on a healthy and equitable planet.
lender.occupational_info: I teach geology and environmental science - to help give people the tools they need to create a socially and environmentally sustainable world.

lender.name: Soenke
lender.loan_because: Third-world entrepreneurs know what they want to achieve. They deserve a proper chance.
lender.occupational_info: Soenke works in a research project that investigates how cultural diversity can aid innovation in small-medium sized companies.

lender.name: Kari
lender.occupational_info: looking inside the body's anatomy with sound waves to help detect disease and abnormalities , to check fetal development, and to assist with invasive procedures

lender.name: Monika
lender.loan_because: i think it´s necessary to do so- and i hope it makes a change
lender.occupational_info: i`m working as a doctor in a small German hospital

lender.name: Asia
lender.loan_because: I believe in balance between giving & receiving

lender.name: Boon Chuan
lender.loan_because: I am also an entrepreneur myself, I saw that what I considered to be tiny amounts of money can actually help other entrepreneurs get started. It is something well worth doing.
lender.occupational_info: I started a few companies especially on the Internet in many countries but am now trying to get a PhD degree.

lender.name: Atanaska
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in this world

lender.name: Sabyrah
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my 3 children (6, 4, and 1) that everything that they do in their lives impacts others. I want them, by the Grace and Mercy of AllahSWT, to be the change that they want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a geriatric assessment nurse in an elderly residential facility. I also consider being a wife and mother my 'job.'

lender.name: Julian
lender.loan_because: people need help
lender.occupational_info: eat, play, burp, laugh

lender.name: Lonneke
lender.loan_because: it's all about giving
lender.occupational_info: I source and organise inspirational speakers for schools.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful thing to be in the position to help others. We have a duty to our fellow humans, our planet and future generations. Everyone can make a difference somewhere if they want to. If each one of us is a tiny ripple in the water then all together we can create a tidal wave of change.
lender.occupational_info: As cabin crew my job is ensuring our customers comfort, safety and security throughout flight. It is a wonderful job because it allows me to visit many different countries throughout the world.

lender.name: Lui & Steve
lender.loan_because: WE can make a positive difference to someone's life by turning hope into a reality.
lender.occupational_info: We operate a Cabinetmaking firm (SM Cabinets). We started small and can appreciate the difference that empowering someone will make to their life and the people that depend on them.

lender.name: Jennie
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together!

lender.name: Birger Norup
lender.loan_because: I have met so much friendship, hospitality, love and "goodness" around the world, and I have been blessed with more than I need. Kiva gives me the opportunity to "pay back" a little.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and do workshops for both busisness people and private people. Working with communications skills programs and connection between heart and brain / I am currently trainer in HeartMath. Also working in the Global Peace Alliance. www.mfp-dop.org - www.gasummit.org

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I don't need my $600 economic stimulus payment and someone else does!

lender.name: Koren
lender.loan_because: I want to help people use their talents and skills to achieve economic self-sufficiency for themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I plan academic events and conferences for a major university.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: A young friend told us about Kiva. Our son just graduated from college. What a perfect way to show our gratitude for the emotional and financial support of our family that allowed him to reach this goal.
lender.occupational_info: I work in my husband's pediatric office, setting up the influenza clinic. I also work at a nearby elementary school.

lender.name: Jeremiah
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help make a difference in someones life a little bit at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I just finished my PhD in Chemical Engineering and am now beginning a career in the nuclear field.

lender.name: M-Auwal Gene III
lender.loan_because: as I grow older, I continue to discover that God gave me two hands for this simple reason: one for helping myself, the other for helping others. I loan because God's gifts to me must not go un-utilized!
lender.occupational_info: I think I am a non-conformist generally; and sometimes my work makes me play god; because creating computer software is sometimes akin to creating a soul.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: after reading 'Banker to the Poor" by Professor Muhammad Yunus I realized that even small loans make a world of difference in a person's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student at a small liberal arts school in central New York.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupational_info: Handle lots of data with computers.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to be able to do so.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it´s important to help people

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: It gives me more meaning in my life, to know that I'm helping someone in a distance land to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an IT Consultant who earns good money therefore it's really satisfying to put some of this money back into the system to enrich the lives of others.

lender.name: Dario,Lizzy,Silvia&Fran
lender.occupational_info: Helping people to realize their dreams

lender.name: MARTY
lender.loan_because: I am doing this to honor my mother, who is a very generous woman.
lender.occupational_info: I sell industrial and construction supplies.

lender.name: Christi
lender.loan_because: I want to.

lender.name: Lee & Bernie
lender.loan_because: God wants us to help others

lender.name: Irma
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: After many years in the teaching profession, I am now retired and have the privilege of much free time which I devote to projects involving education, environmental conservation and helping others.

lender.name: Christoph
lender.loan_because: I think it is nessasary to support other people, while I have enough money.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a teacher for handicapped children.

lender.name: Valarie
lender.loan_because: I can : ) ...

lender.name: Giovanna
lender.occupation: I manage Kiva's portfolio in the Americas
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their abilities to do what is best for themselves, but I like to do my part to help out if I can.

lender.name: glenn
lender.loan_because: I had some extra cash and thought, "What the hell."

lender.name: SchoolHeart, Inc.
lender.loan_because: I feel as if I should do something to help those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: We raise funds for schools, charities and nonprofit orgranizations.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: I think I can do more to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I try and enforce peace.

lender.name: Tak
lender.loan_because: Looking back, I've received a lot of blessings in my life, and am now looking for ways to give back and help make things happen in the lives of others and their families.
lender.occupational_info: trabajo para una compania que publica revistas en miami como la directora de estudios.

lender.name: bettina
lender.loan_because: ...it is necessary! in german we say: to give somebody a fish is good, but it is much more better to give him a fishing rod .
lender.occupational_info: Actually I'm an artist, graphicdesigner, ... I love to create

lender.name: Beatriz
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals who's face I can see.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange film shoots for television commercials.
